data.message: When  log in, I ask to stay logged in but it doesn't work. I have to log in everytime I get on Facebook even if it is 10 times a day. Please help.

replies.message: Hi Carmen. Make sure you have the most up-to-date version of your browser. If you're still experiencing issues, please let us know by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1QnjImj . -Nancy

Facebook Hey Facebook there are many of us curious of what happened to a page we're apart of. It's called "The Girl Next Door Model Search" Many of us have questions. I see you are terribly busy. Could you please contact me and let me know what happened or maybe one of the Admins of the page? Thanks FB : )
